name: SEARCH ALL - CATS
description:
SEARCH ALL - CATS

is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the cats in a large location. Seals will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places. The whole game location looks lively because of the animation elements. Find all the seals! Don't let them go unnoticed :)

Key Features:
- Animation elements on location;
- 80 cute cats to find;
- Pleasant soundtrack;
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result;
- Implemented hints! If you find it difficult to find an item, use the hint!
